ValidationRule.description: When an DCS is in the status "New Request", the field "Pending Reason" can't be modified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Pending_Reason__c ) , ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'New Request') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When an DCS is in the status "New Request", the field "Pending Reason" can't be modified.
